articles.title: Melania Challenges Kids to Create (Trumpy) AI Projects
articles.summary: Melania challenges kids to create (Trumpy) AI projects. K-12 students who enter the nationwide artificial intelligence competition will be judged on their project’s relevance to the Trump administration’s “priorities, values, or vision”.
articles.translated_title: Melania Challenges Kids to Create (Trumpy) AI Projects
articles.translated_summary: Melania challenges kids to create (Trumpy) AI projects. K-12 students who enter the nationwide artificial intelligence competition will be judged on their project’s relevance to the Trump administration’s “priorities, values, or vision”.

articles.title: Melania Trump Takes On New Trump Administration Role
articles.summary: The First lady is leading an initiative by the Trump administration to build interest and expertise in artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump Takes On New Trump Administration Role
articles.translated_summary: The First lady is leading an initiative by the Trump administration to build interest and expertise in artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge
articles.summary: Students who sign up will complete a project using an artificial intelligence method or tool to address a community challenge.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump invites students to participate in AI challenge
articles.translated_summary: Students who sign up will complete a project using an artificial intelligence method or tool to address a community challenge.

articles.title: Melania Trump invites K-12 students to take part in nationwide AI contest
articles.summary: Melania Trump is inviting students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest using artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump invites K-12 students to take part in nationwide AI contest
articles.translated_summary: Melania Trump is inviting students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest using artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Melania Trump Invites K-12 Students to Participate in Nationwide AI Challenge Contest
articles.summary: WASHINGTON (AP) — Melania Trump on Tuesday invited students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest that is designed to encourage them to work together to use artificial intelligence tools to solve community issues.
articles.translated_title: Melania Trump Invites K-12 Students to Participate in Nationwide AI Challenge Contest
articles.translated_summary: WASHINGTON (AP) — Melania Trump on Tuesday invited students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest that is designed to encourage them to work together to use artificial intelligence tools to solve community issues.

articles.title: Gemini image generation is adding more editing tools
articles.summary: The latest image editing model is the work of the DeepMind artificial intelligence team, and these updates will be available starting today in the Gemini app.
articles.translated_title: Gemini image generation is adding more editing tools
articles.translated_summary: The latest image editing model is the work of the DeepMind artificial intelligence team, and these updates will be available starting today in the Gemini app.

articles.title: Letters to the Editor: Tech won’t fix American healthcare’s deeply ingrained problems
articles.summary: 'Of course, technology and artificial intelligence will improve our health system, but that is not the biggest problem our country faces in healthcare,' writes an L.A. Times reader.
articles.translated_title: Letters to the Editor: Tech won’t fix American healthcare’s deeply ingrained problems
articles.translated_summary: 'Of course, technology and artificial intelligence will improve our health system, but that is not the biggest problem our country faces in healthcare,' writes an L.A. Times reader.

articles.title: Can Nvidia results dispel creeping AI doubts?
articles.summary: Questions are arising about when artificial intelligence will deliver its promised returns, meaning tech-concentrated U.S. equity indices sitting near record highs are vulnerable to a correction.
articles.translated_title: Can Nvidia results dispel creeping AI doubts?
articles.translated_summary: Questions are arising about when artificial intelligence will deliver its promised returns, meaning tech-concentrated U.S. equity indices sitting near record highs are vulnerable to a correction.

articles.title: Artificial intelligence can unlock historic data for today’s missions
articles.summary: Advanced chips that didn't exist two years ago can enable smart intelligence, bases, and planning.
